attributes.additional_details:
Its rubbish how you cannot defend your self in this country for example is someone broke into you house when you were sleeping and say you hit him/her with a baseball bat you would get a life sentence in prison.

Or say was walking down the street and someone grabbed you into a bust and tried raping you but you kicked there head in and killed them you would get a life sentence even if you had witnesses.

So take action and change the laws before there is more robbings, muggings and rapes.
